howItWorks.title: Choose your topic
howItWorks.description: Start with a topic and let our AI generate the best keywords for SEO.

howItWorks.title: Generate content step-by-step
howItWorks.description: Select keywords, titles, outlines, and even images using our AI article builder.

howItWorks.title: Export your article instantly
howItWorks.description: Export full HTML blog articles, ready to publish. No login or account required.

faq.question: Is this AI article generator really free?
faq.answer: Yes, it’s 100% free to use. No login, sign-up, or credit card required.

faq.question: Do I need to register or log in?
faq.answer: No. Our AI article writer works instantly without requiring any login.

faq.question: Can I generate articles with images?
faq.answer: Yes. This tool includes AI-generated images to visually support your content.

faq.question: What formats can I export the article to?
faq.answer: You can export the article in clean HTML format, ideal for blogs or CMS platforms.

faq.question: Can I use this AI tool for article summaries?
faq.answer: This tool focuses on full article generation, but upcoming features will support summaries.

faq.question: Is this tool suitable for SEO content?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Our AI generates SEO-optimized content with relevant keywords and structure.

faq.question: Can I write product reviews or how-to articles?
faq.answer: Yes. You can generate structured outlines and articles for reviews, tutorials, and more.

faq.question: Does this support article rewriting or paraphrasing?
faq.answer: Not yet, but we’re working on an AI article rewriter and summarizer for future updates.

faq.question: Can I use this for academic writing?
faq.answer: While not a replacement for research, it can help draft outlines and base content for essays or papers.

faq.question: Does this AI article tool work on mobile?
faq.answer: Yes, our tool is mobile-responsive and works on all modern browsers and devices.
